name: LPMD_S_XML_MODE_2
summary: Verify change default xml configuration to enable low power mode 2 by setting 2 in <Mode>0</Mode>, to perform low power mode force enter, force exit, auto enter lpm, survivability mode enter, survivability mode exit and terminate, then verify if Low Power mode 2 pattern is detected (CPU idle injection), verify if all the activity patterns are correct from debug logs
